svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

Rider Update location" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="90" width="193" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="758" y="147" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="398" y="147" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-8" value="2.) Customer ride request&nbsp;&nbsp;" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="477" y="117" width="234" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-9" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;fontColor=#000000;labelBorderColor=none;strokeColor=#FF0000;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="218" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="760" y="218" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-10" value="<div>No rider found (Incase no rider within the radius set 2KM )</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="472" y="173" width="250" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-11" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="403" y="255" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="77" y="253" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-13" value="Request sent to riders available within the radius, one after the other<div>(Maximum of 5 each allocated 15 seconds to accept or reject)</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="115" y="181" width="230" height="72" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-14" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FF2F05;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="78" y="352" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="398" y="352" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-15" value="3.a) Reject ride request (Incase there are other riders within the radius, request are sent to them basing on order of closeness)" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="127" y="265" width="255" height="74" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-16" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#00ED00;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="79" y="442" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="399" y="442" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="240" y="442" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-17" value="3.b) Accept ride request" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="127" y="401" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-18" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FF2F05;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="466" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="760" y="466" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-19" value="No rider found" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="472" y="431" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-20" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#00ED00;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="401" y="519" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="761" y="519" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-21" value="Ride request accepted" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Verdana;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="479" y="485" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-22" value="" style="endArrow=block;dashed=1;endFill=0;endSize=12;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="760" y="645" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="80" y="645" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-23" value="<font face="Verdana">4.a) Customer shares the start code with the rider</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="470" y="606" width="260" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-25" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="82" y="692" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="402" y="692" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-26" value="<font face="Verdana">4.b) Enter start code</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="117" y="662" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-27" value="" style="endArrow=block;dashed=1;endFill=0;endSize=12;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="759" y="751" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="79" y="751" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="589" y="751" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-28" value="<span style="font-family: Verdana;">5.a) Recipient person shares the delivery code with the rider</span>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="439" y="701" width="301" height="38" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-29" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="81" y="832" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="401" y="832" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-30" value="<font face="Verdana">5.b) Enter delivery code</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="123" y="802" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-31" value="" style="endArrow=block;dashed=1;endFill=0;endSize=12;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-33" value="<span style="font-family: Verdana;">6.a) Customer shares the end code with the rider</span>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="443" y="1016" width="240" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="399" y="1117" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-35" value="<span style="font-family: Verdana;">6.b) Enter end code</span>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="123" y="1084" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="80" y="1168" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="50" y="70" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rT0lq3zHkhvXh9qJEc9S-38" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="760" y="1169" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="780" y="65" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCugZvGFvNOtbIM8yQ3x-3" value="" style="endArrow=block;dashed=1;endFill=0;endSize=12;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="761" y="901" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="77" y="898" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCugZvGFvNOtbIM8yQ3x-5" value="<span style="font-family: Verdana;">5.a ) Recipient person shares the delivery code with the rider</span><div><span style="font-family: Verdana;">(Several deliveries can be served by one rider, he/she should be provided with a delivery code on making every delivery)</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="441" y="800" width="272" height="88" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCugZvGFvNOtbIM8yQ3x-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="81" y="983" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="399" y="986" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCugZvGFvNOtbIM8yQ3x-7" value="<span style="font-family: Verdana; text-align: left;">5.b ) Enter delivery code</span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="163" y="956" width="124" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s6YvcYGB98bTKEADdOlQ-1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="80" y="577" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="402" y="577" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s6YvcYGB98bTKEADdOlQ-2" value="<font face="Verdana">3.c) Reorder deliveries depending on&nbsp;convenience.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="129" y="515" width="212" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
